DOC.brief_title: Celecoxib Versus Diclofenac In The Treatment Of Osteoarthritis Of The Hip
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed osteoarthritis hip require joint replacement Eligible chronic therapy NSAID Hip surgery anticipate within 8 calendar week first visit Active gastrointestinal disease recent diagnosis gastrointestinal ulceration ( within 60 day first visit )
